text: Girl Friends () is a 1936 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Arnshtam.ПОДРУГИПодруги (1935) The movie tells story of the friendship between three girls from Petrograd who grow up together and become nurses during the Russian Civil War. It stars Zoya Fyodorova, Yanina Zhejmo, and Irina Zarubina. ==Actors== * Zoya Fyodorova - Zoya * Yanina Zhejmo - Asya * Irina Zarubina - Natasha * Boris Chirkov - Senka * Boris Babochkin - Andrei * Nikolay Cherkasov - White Army officer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1936 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Arnshtam
title: Girl Friends (1936 movie)
